/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling scene on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The highway is divided into two lanes in each direction, with several cars moving along it. The colors in the image are predominantly green and gray, reflecting the urban landscape. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. In the background, you can see trees lining the road, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. The image provides a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing, showcasing the city's infrastructure and the movement of its inhabitants.
